articles.title: Honda, Toyota, BMW and Kia have discontinued several vehicles. What won't be back in 2022. - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Toyota Avalon, Volkswagen Passat and BMW i3 are among vehicles discontinued in 2021. Passenger cars struggled again as Americans flocked to SUVs.
articles.content:
Old cars never die. They just fade away.
The list of vehicles that were discontinued in 2021 or had their demise announced is voluminous.
As Americans flock to SUVs and pickups, the automotive grav… [+86 chars]
